text: The People Bloc (), formerly Party of Protection of Pensioners of Ukraine (), is a political party in Ukraine registered in January 1998. Партія "Народний блок", Database ACD ==History== Its first election was the Ukrainian 2006 parliamentary elections, the party failed as part of the electoral alliance "Power to the People" to gain any seats winning 0,09% of the votes. In the 30 September 2007 elections, the party failed again as part of the Bloc of the Party of Pensioners of Ukraine to win parliamentary representation. The party renamed itself People Bloc in August 2009. Партія захисту пенсіонерів перейменувалася в «Народний блок», proUA.com (August 3, 2009) The party did not participate in the 2012 parliamentary elections. Results of voting in single constituencies in 2012 & Nationwide list, Central Election Commission of Ukraine And also did not participate in the 2014 Ukrainian parliamentary election.Alphabetical Index of parties in 2014 Ukrainian parliamentary election, Central Election Commission of Ukraine ==References== Category:Political parties in Ukraine Category:Pensioners' parties
title: People Bloc
